thread.title: Jeremy Corbyn to challenge Chinese President Xi Jinping on human rights in one-on-one meeting
thread.title_full: Jeremy Corbyn to challenge Chinese President Xi Jinping on human rights in one-on-one meeting - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Jeremy Corbyn to challenge Chinese President Xi Jinping on human rights in one-on-one meeting
text: Jeremy Corbyn will meet the Chinese President this week to raise the case of Liu Xiaobo, the only Nobel Prize-winner in the world under house arrest, and to call for the release of imprisoned human rights lawyers, The Independent on Sunday understands. The Labour leader had threatened to use a white-tie state banquet on Tuesday evening to raise human rights concerns with President Xi Jinping, prompting British and Chinese officials to quickly arrange a one-to-one meeting. It will be Mr Corbynâ€™s first official meeting with a head of state as Labour leader and is likely to take place at Buckingham Palace before the state banquet. Read more
